survey.title: NATLONAL CONSENSUS SURVEYS
survey.instructions: Please take a few minutes to go through this advertisement in this book. Please take as much time with each ad as you need to. If you ordinarily wear reading glasses, please put them on and take a look before continuing.

questions.text: Now I'd like to ask you a few questions about the ads in the book. What brands or products do you remember seeing advertised in this book? Please list any other brands.

questions.condition: IF NO CIGARETTE BRANDS MENTIONED ABOVE ASK Q.3. IF ONLY ONE CIGARETTE BRAND MENTIONED SKIP TO Q.3. IF ALL THREE CIGARETTE BRANDS MENTIONED SKIP TO Q.4
questions.text: Do you remember any ads for cigarettes?

yes.text: What brands do you remember seeing?

questions.condition: IF OTHER CIGARETTE BRANDS MENTIONED ASK
questions.text: Do you remember any ads for any other brands of cigarettes?
